name: TheDailyArticlebyDrJimDenison
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: We live in a changing world that’s quickly changing America’s culture. So, more than ever, Christians are looking for another perspective on today’s headlines. Dr. Jim Denison’s The Daily Article podcast helps you discern the news differently so you can impact the culture of our nation for God.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
